00015 #ifndef NINJA_BUILD_LOG_H_
00016 #define NINJA_BUILD_LOG_H_
00017 
00018 #include <map>
00019 #include <string>
00020 using namespace std;
00021 
00022 struct BuildConfig;
00023 struct Edge;
00024 
00025 /// Store a log of every command ran for every build.
00026 /// It has a few uses:
00027 ///
00028 /// 1) historical command lines for output files, so we know
00029 ///    when we need to rebuild due to the command changing
00030 /// 2) historical timing information
00031 /// 3) maybe we can generate some sort of build overview output
00032 ///    from it
00033 struct BuildLog {
00034   BuildLog();
00035 
00036   void SetConfig(BuildConfig* config) { config_ = config; }
00037   bool OpenForWrite(const string& path, string* err);
00038   void RecordCommand(Edge* edge, int time_ms);
00039   void Close();
00040 
00041   /// Load the on-disk log.
00042   bool Load(const string& path, string* err);
00043 
00044   struct LogEntry {
00045     string output;
00046     string command;
00047     int time_ms;
00048     bool operator==(const LogEntry& o) {
00049       return output == o.output && command == o.command && time_ms == o.time_ms;
00050     }
00051   };
00052 
00053   /// Lookup a previously-run command by its output path.
00054   LogEntry* LookupByOutput(const string& path);
00055 
00056   /// Serialize an entry into a log file.
00057   void WriteEntry(FILE* f, const LogEntry& entry);
00058 
00059   /// Rewrite the known log entries, throwing away old data.
00060   bool Recompact(const string& path, string* err);
00061 
00062   typedef map<string, LogEntry*> Log;
00063   Log log_;
00064   FILE* log_file_;
00065   BuildConfig* config_;
00066   bool needs_recompaction_;
00067 };
00068 
00069 #endif // NINJA_BUILD_LOG_H_
